properties.address: St Petrock's Church, Church Street, Timberscombe, Minehead TA24 7TP
properties.description: Open from Church is open every day 9:00 to 17:00 and is heated Sunday morning and Thursday morning each week.. We focus on elderly villagers and wish to make young parents/carers with children very welcome also. There is a village hall car park nearby and usually plenty of parking in the village. We are now working to make this child friendly.
properties.title: St Petrock's Church, Timberscombe
